column1: Table 13. Post-release arrests of prisoners released in 30 states in 2005, by sex of releasee
Report title: Recidivism of Prisoners Released in 30 States in 2005: Patterns from 2005 to 2010
Data source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Recidivism of State Prisoners Released in 2005 data collection
Authors: Matthew R. Durose, Alexia D. Cooper, Ph.D., and Howard N. Snyder, Ph.D
Table 13. Post-release arrests of prisoners released in 30 states in 2005, by sex of releasee

Note: Prisoners were tracked for 5 years following release. Number of post-release arrests was rounded to the nearest 1,000. Data on prisoner’s sex were known for 100% of cases. See appendix table 14 for standard errors.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Recidivism of State Prisoners Released in 2005 data collection.
